build.buildCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${RAILWAY_SERVICE_DIR:?set RAILWAY_SERVICE_DIR to one of: backoffice-web, backoffice-api, agent-runtime, evolution-manager, autentique-service, facebook-capi}"; bash "${RAILWAY_SERVICE_DIR}/railway-build.sh"'

deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${RAILWAY_SERVICE_DIR:?set RAILWAY_SERVICE_DIR to one of: backoffice-web, backoffice-api, agent-runtime, evolution-manager, autentique-service, facebook-capi}"; bash "${RAILWAY_SERVICE_DIR}/railway-start.sh"'
